disp-quote.p: “If we choose the cartoon we will be concealing ourselves. To say the truth, many of us hide our HIV status… So, we can choose the cartoon because people will just say that it is a toy (Logo A) … This one is showing exchange of breath, so people will be saying that it is about TB. This picture can put me in problems because people will be asking questions just to mock me and not in good faith. ” Man, FGD with people living with HIV
